verses.verse: For <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G2983>taken<s%> from <S%G3319>among<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> is <S%G2525>ordained<s%> for <S%G444>men<s%> in things pertaining to <S%G2316>God,<s%> that he may <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> and <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> for <S%G266>sins:<s%>

Who <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3356>compassion<s%> on the <S%G50>ignorant,<s%> and on them that are out of the <S%G4105>way;<s%> for that he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> is <S%G4029>compassed<s%> with <S%G769>infirmity.<s%>

And by <S%G1223>reason<s%> <S%G5026>hereof<s%> he <S%G3784>ought,<s%> as for the <S%G2992>people,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> for <S%G1438>himself,<s%> to <S%G4374>offer<s%> for <S%G266>sins.<s%>
And <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2983>takes<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> but he that is <S%G2564>called<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> as was <S%G2>Aaron.<s%>

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> not <S%G1438>himself<s%> to be <S%G1096>made<s%> an <S%G749>high<s%> <S%G749>priest;<s%> but he that <S%G2980>said<s%> to him, You <S%G1488>are<s%> my <S%G5207>Son,<s%> to <S%G4594>day<s%> have I <S%G1080>begotten<s%> you.
As he <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> in <S%G2087>another<s%> place, You are a <S%G2409>priest<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchisedec.<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of his <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> when he had <S%G4374>offered<s%> up <S%G1162>prayers<s%> and <S%G2428>supplications<s%> with <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G2906>crying<s%> and <S%G1144>tears<s%> to him that was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> him from <S%G2288>death,<s%> and was <S%G1522>heard<s%> in that he <S%G2124>feared;<s%>
<S%G2539>Though<s%> he were a <S%G5207>Son,<s%> yet <S%G3129>learned<s%> he <S%G5218>obedience<s%> by the things <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G3958>suffered;<s%>
And being <S%G5048>made<s%> <S%G5048>perfect,<s%> he <S%G1096>became<s%> the <S%G159>author<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G5219>obey<s%> him;
Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> we have <S%G4183>many<s%> things to <S%G3056>say,<s%> and <S%G1421>hard<s%> to be <S%G3004>uttered,<s%> <S%G1893>seeing<s%> you are <S%G3576>dull<s%> of <S%G189>hearing.<s%>

For when for the <S%G5550>time<s%> you <S%G3784>ought<s%> to be <S%G1320>teachers,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> that one <S%G1321>teach<s%> you <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G5101>which<s%> be the <S%G746>first<s%> <S%G4747>principles<s%> of the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%> and are <S%G1096>become<s%> such as <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of <S%G1051>milk,<s%> and not of <S%G4731>strong<s%> <S%G5160>meat.<s%>
For <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G3348>uses<s%> <S%G1051>milk<s%> is <S%G552>unskillful<s%> in the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness:<s%> for he is a <S%G3516>babe.<s%>

But <S%G4731>strong<s%> <S%G5160>meat<s%> <S%G1510>belongs<s%> to them that are of <S%G5046>full<s%> <S%G5046>age,<s%> even <S%G3588>those<s%> who by <S%G1223>reason<s%> of <S%G1838>use<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> their <S%G145>senses<s%> <S%G1128>exercised<s%> to <S%G1253>discern<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> and <S%G2556>evil.<s%>
